PySpark: During my time as a Data Analyst, I developed and deployed PySpark jobs to process large datasets of customer purchases. I engineered data pipelines to transform raw transaction data into aggregated purchase histories. This enabled the marketing team to identify key customer segments, resulting in a 15% increasing sales
Power BI: As a commercial engineer, I developed a power BI dashboard to track sales performance across my customers, with the results I developed differents strategys to increased 10% anual sales
